KEYACH Tolworth Key Area of Change

description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension with juliet balcony including removal of chimney stack and installation of 2no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered not to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

Flood Risk Form - As the proposed development is within Flood Zone 2 you are required to provide a Flood Risk Assessment before the application can be assessed.  For further information and guidance on any aspects of undertaking a Flood Risk Assessment please contact the Environment Agency by visiting their website at http://planningguidance.communities.gov.uk/blog/guidance/flood-risk-and-coastal-change/site-specific-flood-risk-assessment-checklist/
